data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Damoh, Madhya Pradesh, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Damoh, Madhya Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,234,955 who are far from you in Damoh, Madhya Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 13,906 believers in the county of Damoh to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Damoh. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kayastha Sribastab people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kayastha Sribastab people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kayastha Sribastab people is yours.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Damoh who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Damoh, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Damoh, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,264,200.

We estimate Damoh has 13,906 people who might know Jesus, 15,339 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,234,955 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Damoh to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.
